name: A Simple Game of Chess (Early Access)
name_original: A Simple Game of Chess (Early Access)
description: This is a game of chess that you can play with or without your friends. This game is still in development, but the official version will be released over time. This is still version one of the game, but enjoy playing. I am horrible at programming, so some things still don't work. But otherwise, this is a game of chess with basic functions that you can play local multiplayer with your friends or by yourself, in your free time. Hope you enjoy and play a game of chess, will ya?
